sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Section } from "../../../styles/styles"; import Title from '../../../features/title/Title'; import { isCatalogueTitle } from '../../../data/TitleData'; import { FooterData } from "../../../data/FooterData"; import Footer from "../../../features/footer/Footer" import { Content, BlockLeft, BlockRight } from "./BasketElement" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from "../../../features/actions/cartAction" import { selectBasketData } from "../../../features/reducers/BasketSlice"; const Basket = () =>{ const data = useSelector(selectBasketData) console.log(data); return ( <> <Section> <Container> <Row> { data.map(item => ( <Content> <BlockLeft> <div className="flex"> <div className="image"> <img src={`http://localhost:8000/images/ZERProBestC1SC1Rec.jpg`} alt=""/> </div> <div className=""> <h5>{item.nameCat}</h5> </div> <div className="quantity"> <label>1</label> </div> <div className="price"> <strong> {item.priceCfaProduct} Fcfa<br/> {item.priceEuroProduct} € </strong> </div> </div> </BlockLeft> <BlockRight> <div> <div className="titre">Détails de l'achat</div> <div className="table"> <div className="tr"> <div className="td">Prix</div> <div className="td">{item.priceCfaProduct} Fcfa</div> </div> <div className="tr last"> <div className="td">Total</div> <div className="td">{item.priceEuroProduct} Fcfa</div> </div> </div> </div> </BlockRight> </Content> )) } </Row> </Container> </Section> <Footer footerData = {FooterData}/> </> ) } export default Basket
